title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description:
When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the key as blank in the properties file, while having a valid value.

Observed behavior:
The externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.

Expected behavior:
The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
OB: The externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: 1. Set the externalize text in the chart title.
